channel.title: Sdlc on Rusty Eddy
channel.description: Recent content in Sdlc on Rusty Eddy

item.title: Software Development Lifecycle Phases
item.description:
An Tale of Software Development

I had a great idea to help my wife maintain her massive succulent collection by building a self watering garden. This project would consist of these primary components:

  1. The soil sensor that can be burried in some dirt to measure the moisture level of the respective soil and publish the moisture level to some controlling software.

  2. A small pump or drip system that will turn on when the moisture level gets too low, likewise turn off when the soil gets we enough.
